short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage you JIRA tickets in a more seamless way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fetches data from the JIRA API and deploys a user-friendly dashboard to manage tickets in a more seamless way.
Access the extention by this url:

https://YOUR_ORGANIZATION.atlassian.net/jira/dashboards/tickets
